# Rangers_Survey_2024

Bayesian hit streak simulation: Semien_HitStreak_Nielson_Final.pdf

Find my RShiny visualization at 
https://grant-nielson.shinyapps.io/win_prob/

Pitch Predction: 

SQL QUERIES: 
[SQL Queries](https://csvfiddle.io/#
)

It wouldn't let me upload pitch_data.csv, so if you run my code you'll have to download it yourself. Team and player data are here.

Side Note:
There are some inconsistencies in the data. For example, if you query:
SELECT * 
FROM pitch_data 
WHERE game_pk = 670284
AND inning = 4
AND inning_half = 'BOTTOM'
AND batter_mlb_player_id = 687052;

You'll see that the base_state and score don't align. I noticed this when spot-checking my purple dots for the default 4/8 game.
